physical_appearance:This is a set of items in a khaki cloth pouch. The pouch is strung closed by a string in the middle. The buckles

sgcool_label_text:A khaki cloth pouch with rused belt buckles
 a pin and tag are part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a set of items in a khaki cloth pouch. The pouch is strung closed by a string in the middle. The buckles, tag and pin appear to be quite rusty. The pouch is slightly dirty and stained .

metadata.sgcool_label_text: A khaki cloth pouch with rused belt buckles, a pin and tag are part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
